resources.string: This apps purpose is to encourage you to do daily walking exercise.\nThat is why its going to notify you every day, and you get to chose how much you want to walk.\nThe app tracks your movement data, so you will get to know about everything.
Before you get to use the app, you need to give some must permissions.
This is needed, because without this, the app would have no clue where you are.
This is needed, so you can scan QR-codes, shared by your friends.
This is needed, so that the app can notify you daily, to move.
This is needed, so that the app knows how many steps have you walked.
Please turn on the internet and the GPS!
Select the distance you want to walk, then press the start button.
Hold up for a sec!\nYou can be on your way soon.
Press the button, if you no longer want to walk.
Please turn on the internet connectivity and the GPS to be able to use the application!
Scan the QR code from your friends phone!
If you want to share a QR code, start the navigaion.
Show this QR code to your friend!
If you want to scan QR codes, stop the navigation.
Please grant access to the camera, to be able to scan QR codes
It is time for a walk
It is time for your daily walking!
